```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(shiny)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
countryplot <- read.csv("newtable1_5.csv")
```

```{r}
ggplot(countryplot, aes(countryplot$'X2012', countryplot$'X2014', color= LocationDesc)) + xlab("2012_values") + ylab("2014_values") + geom_point()
```
```{r}
inputPanel(
  selectInput("LocationDesc", label = "State", choices = unique(countryplot$LocationDesc))
)
```
```{r}
renderPlot({
  countryplot%>% 
  filter(LocationDesc == input$LocationDesc) %>% +
  ggplot(countryplot, aes_(countryplot$'X2012', countryplot$'X2014', color= LocationDesc)) +xlab("2012_values") + ylab("2014_values")+geom_point()
})
```
